ca.corefacility.gview.writers

Class ImageWriterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.writers.ImageWriterFactory

  • public class ImageWriterFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods to build an ImageWriter to be used to write GView-generated images to a specific file format.

    • Method Detail

      • createImageWriter

        public static ImageWriter createImageWriter(java.lang.String imageExtension)
        Create an ImageWriter for the passed file format.
        Parameters:
        imageExtension - The file format (by extension of file) to use.
        Returns:
        An ImageWriter for the passed file format, or null if format not supported.

      • acceptsExtension

        public static boolean acceptsExtension(java.lang.String extension)
        Determines if we can construct an ImageWriter with the passed extension.
        Parameters:
        extension - The extension to check against.
        Returns:
        True if support is provided for this extension, false otherwise.

      • getAcceptedExtensions

        public static java.lang.String[] getAcceptedExtensions()
        Gets a copy of the string array of accepted extensions.
        Returns:
        A copy of the string array of accepted extensions.

      • acceptsFile

        public static boolean acceptsFile(java.io.File file)
        Checks if the passed file can be saved to (format is correct).
        Parameters:
        file - The file to save to.
        Returns:
        True if this file format is supported, false otherwise.

      • createImageWriter

        public static ImageWriter createImageWriter(java.io.File file)
        Creates an ImageWriter from the passed file, based on the file format.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to create an ImageWriter around.
        Returns:
        An ImageWriter to support writing to the passed file format.

      • extractExtension

        public static java.lang.String extractExtension(java.lang.String filename)
        Extracts the extension from the passed file name.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file name to extract the extension from.
        Returns:
        The extension of the passed file name.
